participant_1.background:
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
i am a great baker.
I love to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
i am a house wife.
I like to spend time with my pets because it makes me feel young.

participant_2.background:
I used social media to stay connected with my friends and family during the holidays, but I didn't let it take over my life.
I have breakfast with my brothers and talk about our day.
I remember buying my first ice cream cone when I was four.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
I wake up early and enjoy a cup of coffee with my boyfriend before we head to work.

content.text: Good morning, how is your day going?
It is going great! I am enjoying a cup of coffee with my boyfriend and talking about our day.
That sounds lovely, I am just about to go for a ride on my horse, Beauty.
That sounds like fun! I used to ride horses as a child but I don't anymore.
It is so relaxing and I love being out in nature.
I agree, nature is very therapeutic.
I also enjoy reading about holistic health and natural remedies.
That is great, I like to stay healthy and I am always looking for new ways to do that.
I am a house wife and I love to bake. I am a great baker!
That is so cool, I love to bake too! I am not very good at it but I still enjoy it.
It is a lot of fun and you can make so many delicious things.
I agree, it is always fun to try new recipes.
I hope you have a wonderful day!
